paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted genetic variant information for KCNH2, including penetrance data.

individual_records.phenotype_details: severe attacks of unilateral facial pain
individual_records.evidence_sentence: The patient was a 61-year-old woman with severe attacks of unilateral facial pain, beginning at the age of 60.

functional_data.summary: The variant is a novel missense variant in KCNH2.

variants.segregation_data: The patient and her older brother also had a history of trigeminal neuralgia.
variants.additional_notes: The variant is novel and classified as a variant of uncertain significance.
key_quotes: The patient carried a novel missense variant c.1489 G > A (p.Gly497Ser) in KCNH2.

extraction_metadata.notes: All relevant data for KCNH2 was extracted from the main text.
